at(uint256).details: Empty responses, as long as they are of the correct format, will be overridden by the Global.latestPrice

returns._0: The factory that created this instance
The global state of the oracle

next().details: Returns 0 if no next version is requested

register(address).details: The oracle provider is the only authorized caller

returns._1: The current oracle version collecting new orders

at(uint256).notice: Returns an empty response of the correct v2.3 format for forwards compatibility of the previous sub-oracle

current().notice: Returns the current oracle version accepting new orders

factory().notice: Returns the factory that created this instance

global().notice: Returns the global state of the oracle

latest().notice: Returns the latest synced oracle version

next().notice: Returns the next requested oracle version

status().notice: Returns the latest synced oracle version and the current oracle version

userdoc.notice: Stub implementation to upgrade the prior KeeperOracle to during the v2.3 migration for compatibility.
